short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capitalize title texts without second thoughts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text, right click the selection, and choose "Capitalize". It's as simple as that. Capitalizing tweets? Blog post titles? Any kind of other text? Capitalizer got you covered. Title case with no second thoughts.
